text: Ristović () is a Serbian patronymic surname derived from a masculine given name Risto. It may refer to: *Milan Ristović (born 1953), historian *Nikolina Ristović (born 1976), television presenter *Predrag Ristović (born 1975), footballer *Risto Ristović (born 1988), footballer Category:Serbian-language surnames
title: Ristović
